item.description:
Learn everything about Type 9, The Peacemaker, and how to relate to them. Learn about subtypes, growth, defenses and strengths and ways to develop other types in yourself. Open to 9s, anyone curious about 9 and anyone in relationship to a 9.

Taught by Herb Pearce, M.Ed. Counseling, a therapist, Enneagram expert teacher and author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living as well as his soon to be Enneagram for Advanced Students.

781 648 3737

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Type 9 Peacemaker workshop (Open to all types)
